description: 12.1 inch touchscreen precision ag display with Android OS - runs Precision-IQ and field mapping
tractor_compatibility: Universal ISOBUS - JD / Case IH / NH / Fendt / MF / Kubota / Claas / Challenger
key_features: 12.1 inch HD touchscreen - Android OS - multi-app support - ISOBUS UT/TC - camera inputs - USB

description: 7 inch touchscreen display for guidance and basic precision ag operations
key_features: 7 inch touchscreen - Precision-IQ - lightbar guidance - basic ISOBUS

description: Dual-frequency GNSS receiver with RTK capability and integrated IMU
tractor_compatibility: Pairs with GFX-1260 or GFX-750 displays
key_features: GPS / GLONASS / Galileo / BeiDou - RTK capable - CenterPoint RTX

description: Entry-level GNSS receiver for sub-meter guidance applications
key_features: GPS / GLONASS - SBAS corrections - basic guidance

description: Hydraulic auto-steer system with motor-on-column for aftermarket installation
tractor_compatibility: Universal - hydraulic steering tractors - JD / Case IH / NH / Fendt / MF / Kubota / Claas
key_features: Motor-on-column - sub-inch accuracy with RTK - hands-free operation

description: Entry-level motor-on-wheel auto-steer for older tractors
Satellite-delivered RTK-level correction service - no base station required
key_features: Sub-inch repeatable accuracy - satellite delivered - no cell or radio

description: Mid-accuracy satellite correction for guidance applications
Section and rate control system for sprayers and planters
key_features: Individual nozzle control - variable rate - prescription maps - section shutoff

description: Active implement steering for precise row tracking on hillsides and contours
tractor_compatibility: Towed implements - planters / drills / strip-till bars
key_features: Hydraulic implement steering - maintains row accuracy on contours

description: Cloud-based farm data management platform with field records and analytics
tractor_compatibility: Platform agnostic - integrates with Trimble hardware
key_features: Field boundaries - yield data - prescription creation - reporting

description: Legacy 10.4 inch precision ag display still widely used in field
key_features: 10.4 inch touchscreen - Connected Farm - ISOBUS - camera inputs

description: Real-time crop canopy sensor for on-the-go variable rate nitrogen
tractor_compatibility: Mounts on sprayer boom or toolbar - any brand
key_features: NDVI measurement - real-time VRA nitrogen - reduces N waste 10-15%

description: Machine vision spot-spray system detecting weeds in fallow or stubble
tractor_compatibility: Mounts on sprayer boom - any brand
key_features: Individual nozzle weed detection - 90% herbicide savings in fallow

description: Aftermarket yield monitor for combines without factory yield systems
tractor_compatibility: Universal - adapts to most combine clean grain elevators
